RAEXIR21FileHeader.PublishComment: Changed the additional information of "PLMN used in Radio Broadcast: 45412 / 45413 / 45430". The main update is PLMN 45413 will support LTE.

OrganisationInfo.OrganisationName: China Mobile Hong Kong Company Limited

Network.NetworkName: China Mobile Hong Kong Company Limited

RoutingInfo.AdditionalInformation: IMSI : The IMSI complies with GSM 03.03 and CCITT E.212 and has a fixed length of 15 digits. IMSI (E.212) = MCC (E.212) + MNC (E.212) + MSIN (E.212) MCC= 454 MNC= 12 IMSI-MGT : For a CMHK subscriber, the translator has to do the following conversion : MCC = 454 to CC = 852 MNC = 12 to NDC =920 PLMN used in Radio Broadcast: 45412 / 45413 / 45430 For outbound roamers will use the 45412 IMSI range.

ChangeHistoryItem.Description: Add New Mobile level 4680 0000 to 4689 9999 and 8400 0000 to 8409 9999
Added number level 46900000 to 46989999 and 59500000 to 59589999
Added a new network GT range 852 512xxxxx
Changed the PLMN used in Radio Broadcast are 45412 / 45413 / 45430
CMHK will terminate Telstra SCCP services in 15-Mar-2018, thus please inform your SCCP carrier to re-route all CMHK SCCP traffic through TATA, CMI or CITIC.
Update Network Elements GT of Huawei
Updated NE info - 852512126000 (MVNO HLR) and 852512126001 (MVNO SMSC)
Update List of Data Service supported in GPRS
New Backbone IP(Subnet of 193.181.247.X)(Multiple Operator Use)
Updated 6 IP address ranges for MVNO
Disable the Information for Diameter certificates exchange
Added CITIC as one of CMHK IPX carrier
Removed Sybase of IPX Provider and Update EPC Realms information
Update of diameter end to end security support
Revised the IR.21 Distribution Email address list
Update SCCP Inquiries and Ordering Contacts
Udpate IR.21 Distribution Email address list
Removed Telstra SCCP contact information and added TATA and CMI SCCP contact information.
Added contact of Certificates and key management contacts
